dialogue.htmlContent: Knowing that [npc.name(a)] is prowling around this area, you make sure to stay on high alert as you wander down the track that runs alongside Dominion's canal. Just as you suspected, as you cautiously pass a collection of leafy bushes growing on one side of the path, a shadowy figure leaps out, blocking your path! You instantly recognise the [npc.fullRace(true)], and you instinctively jump back into a fighting stance as you expect this encounter to be much the same as the last one.

Knowing that [npc.name(a)] is prowling around this area, you make sure to stay on high alert, carefully checking each and every dark corner and recess as you walk through the twisting passages. Just as you suspected, as you cautiously pass an inset doorway, a shadowy figure leaps out, blocking your path! You instantly recognise the [npc.fullRace(true)], and you instinctively jump back into a fighting stance as you expect this encounter to be much the same as the last one.

#IF npc.isCharacterPossiblyFather(pc.getId()) #THEN #IF npc.hasFetish(FETISH_PREGNANCY) #THEN

As [npc.she] steps out from the shadows, you notice that there's definitely something different about [npc.herHim] this time. The consequence of ejaculating inside of [npc.herHim] is staring you right in the face, and you gulp as you see [npc.herHim] pointing down at [npc.her] [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)].

[npc.speech(That's right, you got me knocked up!)] she shouts, the excitement in [npc.her] voice giving away the fact that [npc.sheHas] clearly got a fetish for being pregnant. [npc.speech(I love carrying our kids around, I'm so glad you didn't pull out!)]

#ELSE

[npc.speech(Look what you did, you asshole!)] [npc.she] shouts, confirming that you're the father of [npc.her] children. [npc.speech(Do you know how annoying it is being pregnant?! You're gonna pay for this!)]

#ENDIF #ELSE #IF npc.isCharacterPossiblyFather(npc2.getId()) #THEN #IF npc.hasFetish(FETISH_PREGNANCY) #THEN

[npc.speech(That's right, you got me knocked up!)] she shouts, the excitement in [npc.her] voice giving away the fact that [npc.sheHas] clearly got a fetish for being pregnant. [npc.speech(I love carrying our kids around, I'm so glad you didn't pull out!)]

[npc.speech(Look what you did, you asshole!)] [npc.she] shouts, confirming that [npc2.nameIs] the father of [npc.her] children. [npc.speech(Do you know how annoying it is being pregnant?! You're gonna pay for this!)]

#ENDIF #ELSE #IF npc.hasFetish(FETISH_PREGNANCY) #THEN

As [npc.she] steps out from the shadows, however, you notice that there's definitely something different about [npc.herHim] this time. The consequence of your old companion having ejaculating inside of [npc.herHim] is staring the two of you right in the face, and you gulp as [npc.name] points down at [npc.her] [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)].

[npc.speech(That's right, your friend got me knocked up!)] she shouts, the excitement in [npc.her] voice giving away the fact that [npc.sheHas] clearly got a fetish for being pregnant. [npc.speech(I love being pregnant, I'm so glad they didn't pull out!)]

#ELSE

[npc.speech(Look what your asshole friend did!)] [npc.she] shouts, confirming that your old companion is the father of [npc.her] children. [npc.speech(Do you know how annoying it is being pregnant?! Seeing as they're not with you anymore, I'm gonna have to make you pay in their place!)]

#ENDIF #ENDIF #ENDIF

#IF npc.hasFetish(FETISH_PREGNANCY) #THEN You see that [npc.sheIs] still sporting a round, [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)], and [npc.she] absent-mindedly strokes [npc.her] swollen bump as [npc.she] laughs, [npc.speech(That's right, I'm still pregnant, all thanks to you!)] #ELSE You see that [npc.sheIs] still sporting a round, [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)], and [npc.she] absent-mindedly strokes [npc.her] swollen bump as [npc.she] scowls, [npc.speech(That's right, I'm still pregnant, and it's all your fault!)] #ENDIF

[npc.speech(You two again?!)] [npc.she] shouts. [npc.speech(This'll be a lot easier if you both just give up right now!)]

Knowing that [npc.name(a)] calls this area [npc.her] home, you make sure to stay on the lookout for [npc.herHim] as you wander down the track that runs alongside Dominion's canal. Just as you suspected, as you pass a collection of leafy bushes growing on one side of the path, you see a familiar figure leaning against a brick wall up ahead. You instantly recognise the [npc.fullRace(true)], and as you approach, [npc.she] turns towards you and cautiously waves a greeting.

Knowing that [npc.name(a)] calls this area [npc.her] home, you make sure to stay on the lookout for [npc.herHim] as you walk through the twisting passages. Just as you suspected, as you turn around a sharp corner, you see a familiar figure leaning against a brick wall up ahead. You instantly recognise the [npc.fullRace(true)], and as you approach, [npc.she] turns towards you and cautiously waves a greeting

As [npc.she] steps forwards to say hello, you immediately notice that there's something very different about [npc.herHim]. The consequence of ejaculating inside of [npc.herHim] is staring you right in the face, and you gulp as you see [npc.herHim] pointing down at [npc.her] [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)].

[npc.speech(Looks like you're still carrying my kids around!)] [npc.name] says, smiling as [npc.she] looks down at your swollen belly. [npc.speech(You make sure to take good care of them!)]
[npc.speech(Hi, [pc.name]!)] [npc.she] shouts. [npc.speech(There's no need for any violence or anything...)]

#IF npc.isAttractedTo(pc) #THEN Your powerful arcane aura is clearly turning [npc.herHim] on, and from [npc.her] hungry gaze that lingers on your body, you can tell that [npc.she] wants to have sex with you. #ELSE Although your powerful arcane aura is turning [npc.herHim] on a little, it doesn't look as though [npc.sheIs] really all that interested in your body, and is only interested in talking to you. #ENDIF

You talk with [npc.name] for a while.
You give [npc.name] some money.
You attack [npc.name].
You talk to [npc.name].
You apologise to [npc.name].

[style.italics(You feel as though you've got to know [npc.name] well enough to feel comfortable with inviting [npc.herHim] to come and live with you. You'd need to get Lilaya's permission first, however...)]
[style.italics(You feel as though you've got to know [npc.name] well enough to feel comfortable with inviting [npc.herHim] to come and live with you.)]
You ask [npc.name] if [npc.she]'d like to escape the life of a mugger and come live with you. [npc.She] can't quite believe it, and holds back tears as [npc.she] accepts.
[npc.Name] is eternally grateful to you for saving [npc.herHim] from [npc.her] terrible life.
You gather your things and prepare to continue on your way.
You gather your things and prepare to continue on your way. [npc.Name] is annoyed that [npc.she] didn't orgasm.

You find yourself wandering down the track that runs alongside Dominion's canal. As you walk past a collection of leafy bushes growing on one side of the path, a shadowy figure suddenly leaps out, blocking your path!
You find yourself walking down yet another narrow passage, lined by a series of inset doorways. As you're passing one such recess, a figure suddenly jumps out from the shadows, blocking your path!

You leap back, narrowly avoiding a blow aimed at your stomach, and prepare yourself for a fight. Looking up, you see [npc.a_fullRace(true)] grinning devilishly at you.

[npc.speech(What do we have here?)] [npc.she] asks, letting out a short laugh as [npc.she] sees that you're ready to fight [npc.herHim]. [npc.speech(It'll be a lot easier if you just give up!)]

#IF npc.isAttractedTo(pc) #THEN Your powerful arcane aura is clearly turning [npc.herHim] on, and from [npc.her] hungry gaze that lingers on your body, you're able to get a good idea of what [npc.she] wants to do with you. #IF game.isNonConEnabled() #THEN Knowing that defeat will result in being raped by this horny [npc.race], you ready yourself for a fight. #ELSE Knowing that defeat will result in this horny [npc.race] wanting to have sex with you, you ready yourself for a fight. #ENDIF #ELSE Although your powerful arcane aura is turning [npc.herHim] on a little, it doesn't look as though [npc.sheIs] really all that interested in your body, and will most likely only rob you if you were to lose this fight. #ENDIF

#IF pc.isNeurotic() #THEN Wanting to avoid a fight if at all possible, you take a step backwards, fumbling about to grab a handful of flames to offer to [npc.name]. [pc.speech(I don't want to fight! Please, just take my money and leave me alone!)] #ELSE #IF pc.isConfident() #THEN Not wanting to waste your time dealing with this pathetic [npc.race], you produce a handful of flames, before confidently stepping forwards and holding them out to the mugger. [pc.speech(Count yourself lucky that I've got far more important things to do than waste my time on a miserable wretch like yourself!)] #ELSE Not wanting to get caught up in a fight with this [npc.race], you decide to take the safer route, and offer [npc.herHim] a handful of your flames. [pc.speech(Here's your money. Now step aside and let me pass.)] #ENDIF #ENDIF

[npc.speech(Give that to me!)] [npc.name] snaps, [npc.her] desire to rob you of your money obviously the motivating factor behind [npc.her] assault. Before you can reply, [npc.she] quickly steps forwards, before snatching the flames out of your [pc.hand]. With a mocking laugh, [npc.she] stands aside and sneers, [npc.speech(Now get out of my sight!)]

#IF pc.isVigilant() #THEN With the conflict now resolved, you continue on your way, making sure to keep an eye on [npc.name] in case [npc.she] tries following you. Thankfully, it looks like [npc.sheIs] more concerned with counting out [npc.her] ill-gotten gains than attempting to make any sort of threatening move, and after just a moment, you turn a corner and leave the [npc.race] behind. #ELSE #IF pc.isCareless() #THEN With the conflict now resolved, you continue on your way, not even bothering to give [npc.name] a backwards glance. After just a moment, you turn a corner and leave the [npc.race] behind, thankful that you were able to avoid a violent confrontation. #ELSE With the conflict now resolved, you continue on your way, giving [npc.name] one last backwards glance to make sure [npc.she] isn't going to follow you. Thankfully, it looks like [npc.sheIs] more concerned with counting out [npc.her] ill-gotten gains than attempting to make any sort of threatening move, and after just a moment, you turn a corner and leave the [npc.race] behind. #ENDIF #ENDIF

Wanting to avoid a fight, and unwilling to hand over any of your money, you decide to do the only other thing you can think of, and flash a seductive smile at [npc.name]. [pc.speech(There's no need to fight. If you're looking for a bit of fun, all you have to do is ask...)]

[npc.speech(Oh really?)] [npc.name] replies, stepping forwards in an intimidating manner. You remain in place, biting your [pc.lip] and trying to make yourself as small as possible as you attempt to entice [npc.name] into using you for some sexual relief.

Much to your delight, your would-be attacker reaches up and grabs you by the [pc.arms], before pulling you forwards into a tight embrace. Pressing [npc.her] [npc.lips] against yours, [npc.she] thrusts [npc.her] [npc.tongue] into your mouth, aggressively kissing you for a moment before pulling back, growling, [npc.speech(You're going to be a good [pc.girl] now, aren't you bitch?)]

Whimpering in the affirmative, you surrender yourself to [npc.namePos] dominant touch, allowing yourself to be used as payment for trespassing on [npc.her] territory...

Wanting to avoid a fight, and unwilling to hand over any of your money, you decide to do the only other thing you can think of, and flash a seductive smile at [npc.name]. [pc.speech(There's no need to fight. If you're looking for a bit of fun, all you have to do is ask...)]

[npc.speech(Oh really?)] [npc.name] replies, stepping forwards in an intimidating manner. You remain in place, biting your [pc.lip] and trying to make yourself as small as possible as you attempt to entice [npc.name] into using you for some sexual relief.

[npc2.speech(Are you sure about this?)] [npc2.name] asks, stepping forwards in preparation to defend you from [npc.namePos] advances.

[pc.speech(Don't worry, [npc2.name],)] you reply, reaching out to take hold of [npc2.her] [npc2.arm], before firmly pushing [npc2.her] to one side. [pc.speech(I've got this. You just keep a lookout for anyone else.)]

Much to your delight, your would-be attacker isn't put off by [npc2.namePos] interruption, and reaches up to grab you by the [pc.arms], before pulling you forwards into a tight embrace. Pressing [npc.her] [npc.lips] against yours, [npc.she] thrusts [npc.her] [npc.tongue] into your mouth, aggressively kissing you for a moment before pulling back, growling, [npc.speech(You're going to be a good [pc.girl] now, aren't you bitch? Your little friend over there can watch me fuck you senseless!)]

Whimpering in delight, you surrender yourself to [npc.namePos] dominant touch, allowing yourself to be used as payment for trespassing on [npc.her] territory...

Wanting to avoid a fight, and unwilling to hand over any of your money, you decide to do the only other thing you can think of, and flash a seductive smile at [npc.name]. [pc.speech(There's no need to fight. If you're looking for a bit of fun, [npc2.name] and I are more than happy to play along...)]

#IFnpc2.isAttractedTo(npc) || !game.isNonConEnabled() #THEN[npc2.speech(That's right,)] [npc2.name] teases. [npc2.speech(We can satisfy your desires...)] #ELSE[npc2.speech([pc.Name]!)] [npc2.name] interjects. [npc2.speech(I-I really don't want to do this!)] #ENDIF

[npc.speech(Mmm, fucking the two of you at once? How could anyone say no to that?!)] [npc.name] laughs, stepping forwards and placing [npc.a_hand] on each of your waists. With a hungry growl, [npc.she] dominantly pulls the two of you up against [npc.herHim], before leaning in to give you a passionate kiss.

As you press yourself up against [npc.name], [npc.she] suddenly breaks off the kiss, before turning to [npc2.name] and giving [npc2.herHim] a taste of [npc.her] [npc.lips]. #IFnpc2.isAttractedTo(npc) || !game.isNonConEnabled() #THEN [npc2.Name] lets out a delighted [npc2.moan], before eagerly returning the kiss and [npc2.moaning], [npc2.speech(~Mmm!~ Yes!)] #ELSE [npc2.Name] lets out a flustered yelp, before pushing [npc.name] away from [npc2.herHim] and shouting, [npc2.speech(G-Get away from me!)] #ENDIF

Before either of you can make another move, [npc.name] suddenly reaches up to grab you both by the shoulders, and with a determined push, forces the two of you down onto all fours. Dropping down behind you, [npc.name] growls, [npc.speech(You dirty sluts! I'll put the two of you in your place!)]

Wanting to avoid a fight, and unwilling to hand over any of your money, you decide to do the only other thing you can think of. Turning towards [npc2.name], you step towards [npc2.herHim], and in a low tone, you ask, [pc.speech(You'll take one for the team, won't you, [npc2.name]? I don't really want to get into a fight, and I'm not handing over any of my money. All you need to do is spread your legs...)]

#IFnpc2.isAttractedTo(npc) || !game.isNonConEnabled() #THEN[npc2.speech(Sure thing, [pc.name],)] [npc2.name] replies. [npc2.speech(If that's really what you want me to do...)] #ELSE[npc2.speech([pc.Name]! W-What the hell?!)] [npc2.name] replies in alarm. [npc2.speech(I-I really don't want to do that!)] #ENDIF

[npc.speech(What are you two muttering about?!)] [npc.name] calls out, stepping forwards and preparing to fight the two of you.

#IFnpc2.isAttractedTo(npc) || !game.isNonConEnabled() #THEN[npc2.speech(We were just deciding who's going to be the lucky one you get to fuck!)] [npc2.name] replies, turning around and stepping up to [npc.name]. [npc2.speech(And it turns out it's me!)] #ELSE[pc.speech(We were just deciding who's going to be the lucky one you get to fuck!)] you reply, spinning [npc2.name] around and pushing [npc2.herHim] towards [npc.name]. [pc.speech(And it turns out it's [npc2.name]!)] #ENDIF

Before either of you can make another move, [npc.name] lets out a hungry [npc.moan], before reaching up to grab [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arm]. With a dominant pull, [npc.she] forces [npc2.name] into [npc.her] embrace, before planting a passionate kiss on [npc2.her] [npc2.lips]. After a moment, [npc.she] breaks away, before growling, [npc.speech(You're going to be a good [npc2.girl] now, aren't you bitch? Your little friend over there can watch me fuck you senseless!)]

You let out a sigh of relief, happy that you had [npc2.name] to use as a bargaining chip. Leaning back against a nearby wall, you decide to keep watch for any other aggressors while [npc.name] has [npc.her] fun with your companion...

You find yourself walking down the deserted streets of Dominion, the eerie silence broken only by the occasional crash of arcane thunder high above you. There are many hiding places for a would-be attacker to conceal themselves in, and as you pass one such place, taking the form of a building's shadowy doorway, a figure suddenly leaps out at you. Thankfully, as you were taking care to be alert, you quickly step backwards and manage to avoid a punch aimed at your stomach.

[npc2.speech(Hey!)] [npc2.name] calls out, stepping forwards to stand by your side and confront this unknown assailant.

As the two of you get a better look at the mysterious figure, you see that [npc.sheIs] [npc.a_fullRace(true)]. As you look up at [npc.her] [npc.face+], you see a desperately hungry look in [npc.her] [npc.eyes], and you know that the arcane thunder has driven [npc.herHim] into a state of uncontrollable lust. [npc.She] looks determined to claim both you and [npc2.name] as [npc.her] prizes, and is ready to fight the two of you in order to claim your bodies.

[npc.speech(Come on now, there's no need for any violence!)] [npc.she] teases, [npc.her] voice dripping with lustful desperation as [npc.she] takes a step forwards. [npc.speech(Just surrender! Come on! I need a good fuck right now!)]

The arcane storm, combined with your powerful aura, has filled [npc.herHim] with a wild lust, and, #IF game.isNonConEnabled() #THEN knowing that defeat will result in the two of you being raped by this horny [npc.race], both you and [npc2.name] ready yourselves for a fight. #ELSE knowing that defeat will result in this horny [npc.race] wanting to have sex with the two of you, both you and [npc2.name] ready yourselves for a fight. #ENDIF

Wanting to avoid a fight, you decide to give [npc.name] what [npc.she] wants. Flashing a seductive smile [npc.her] way, you [pc.moan], [pc.speech(Come on then, I'm all yours!)]

A delighted, lust-filled smile breaks out across [npc.namePos] face, and [npc.she] instantly rushes forwards, reaching up to grab you by the [pc.arms] before pulling you forwards into a tight embrace.
